meanings.definition: A substance that kills germs or microorganisms.
meanings.sent1: The hospital used germicides to keep the operating room clean.
meanings.sent2: She always carries germicides in her bag to stay healthy.
meanings.sent3: The germicides had a party on the bacteria, wiping them out completely.
meanings.sent4: The germicides acted like tiny warriors, battling against the germs.
meanings.sent5: The powerful germicides swiftly eliminated all the harmful microorganisms.

meanings.sent1: The janitor sprayed germicides to disinfect the restroom.
meanings.sent2: Doctors rely on germicides to prevent infections during surgeries.
meanings.sent3: The germicides high-fived each other after defeating the bacteria.
meanings.sent4: The germicides were like superheroes, saving the day from harmful bacteria.
meanings.sent5: The strong scent of germicides filled the room, signaling their effectiveness against bacteria.
